entry.def: If something is inshore, it is in the sea but quite close to the land. If something moves inshore, it moves from the sea towards the land.

example.ex: A barge was close inshore about a hundred yards away...
example.tran: 一艘驳船离海岸仅约 100 码远。

example.ex: There was still a strong wind blowing inshore.

means.word_mean: 1. (of winds) coming from the sea toward the land;
